docs.snippet: A $8,360,939 contract for radio transmitters of the Air Force's B-52 bomber has been awarded to the Hallicrafters Company.
docs.lead_paragraph: A $8,360,939 contract for radio transmitters of the Air Force's B-52 bomber has been awarded to the Hallicrafters Company.

docs.snippet: Kelso, the champion 4-year-old owned by the Bohemia Stable, will not lack company in the weight-for-age Jockey Club Gold Cup at Aqueduct today.
docs.lead_paragraph: Kelso, the champion 4-year-old owned by the Bohemia Stable, will not lack company in the weight-for-age Jockey Club Gold Cup at Aqueduct today.

headline.main: Kelso 1-10 in $107,800 Aqueduct Gold Cup Today; '60 HORSE OF YEAR FACES 5 'UPSTARTS' 43d Jockey Club Gold Cup Has 3 Surprise Entries -- Kelso Aims to Repeat

docs.snippet: The strong upward movement of the British pound sterling continued to dominate the foreign exchange market last week. Turnover of the pound was heavy. Canadian dollar was firm on light dealings.
docs.lead_paragraph: The strong upward movement of the British pound sterling continued to dominate the foreign exchange market last week. Turnover of the pound was heavy. Canadian dollar was firm on light dealings.

headline.main: DELAY ON CUBA IS SEEN; Latin Group Is Said to Agree to Put Off O.A.S. Action

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 26 -- A United Nations inquiry committee recommended tonight the immediate termination of South Africa's mandate in South-West Africa.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 26 -- A United Nations inquiry committee recommended tonight the immediate termination of South Africa's mandate in South-West Africa.
docs.abstract: UN com urges ending S Africa's mandate; urges steps toward independence after an interim adm under UN guidance; warns current situation may lead to violence; map

headline.main: South Africa Scored In U.N. on Mandate; U.N. PANEL SCORES AFRICAN MANDATE

byline.original: By KENNETT LOVE Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Without pleasure boating with a good burst of speed there would be no water skiing. Without Fred Waller, once a Long Islander from Huntington who obtained patent No. 1,559,390 thirty-six years ago this week, the sport and craze of doing fantastic...
docs.lead_paragraph: Without pleasure boating with a good burst of speed there would be no water skiing. Without Fred Waller, once a Long Islander from Huntington who obtained patent No. 1,559,390 thirty-six years ago this week, the sport and craze of doing fantastic things on water skis might have been delayed many years.

headline.main: Water Skiing Traced to Former Long Islander; Patent Granted to Waller 36 Years Ago Last Week Pearsall and Dorwin Uncover Origin of Popular Sport

docs.snippet: Spot pound sterling continued to show a firm undertone, though in mid-week it dipped on rumors of a possible cut in the bank rate. Business turnover was at a brisk pace. Canadian dollar fluctuated narrowly on moderate dealings.
docs.lead_paragraph: Spot pound sterling continued to show a firm undertone, though in mid-week it dipped on rumors of a possible cut in the bank rate. Business turnover was at a brisk pace. Canadian dollar fluctuated narrowly on moderate dealings.

docs.snippet: Govt asks Uruguayan Embassy to surrender 3 soldiers in asylum there, charging they took part in plot against Castro
docs.abstract: Govt asks Uruguayan Embassy to surrender 3 soldiers in asylum there, charging they took part in plot against Castro

headline.main: CUBA SEEKS 3 REFUGEES; Bids Uruguay Embassy Yield Army Men Asking Asylum
